name: Revello Speciality Roses
description: Assorted, Handcrafted to perfection forming delightful Chocolate Roses. White Hazelnut Roses - Handcrafted to perfection with signature white chocolate with deliciously creamy Hazelnut center. Dark Butterscotch Roses - A divine Butterscoth center wrapped in signature Dark Chocolate. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
